fftinfo~.c

00001 // fftinfo~ - communicate fft size and hop, etc... to the contents of a pfft~ subpatch
00002 // revised August 2001
00003 
00004 
00005 #include "ext.h"
00006 #include "z_dsp.h"
00007 #include "r_pfft.h"     // public pfft struct in r_pfft.h
00008 
00009 typedef struct _fftinfo
00010 {
00011     t_pxobject x_obj;
00012     t_pfftpub *x_pfft;  // pointer to owning fftpatcher struct
00013     
00014     long x_fftsize;     // size of input fft (in samples)
00015     long x_ffthop;      // hop size for window advance
00016     long x_n;           // vector size (half of fft size if fullspect = 0)
00017     int x_fullspect;    // if full spectra are used
00018     
00019     void *x_out[4];     // array of outlets
00020     
00021 } t_fftinfo;
00022 
00023 void fftinfo_bang(t_fftinfo *x);
00024 void fftinfo_dsp(t_fftinfo *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);
00025 void fftinfo_assist(t_fftinfo *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00026 void fftinfo_free(t_fftinfo *x);
00027 void *fftinfo_new(t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00028 
00029 t_symbol *ps_spfft;
00030 
00031 void *fftinfo_class;
00032 
00033 int fftinfo_warning;    // so it only posts a warning once to the Max window if not inside a pfft
00034     
00035 
00036 int main(void)
00037 {
00038     setup((t_messlist **)&fftinfo_class, (method)fftinfo_new, (method)fftinfo_free, (short)sizeof(t_fftinfo), 0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00039     addmess((method)fftinfo_assist, "assist", A_CANT, 0);
00040     addmess((method)fftinfo_dsp, "dsp", A_CANT, 0);
00041     addbang((method)fftinfo_bang);
00042     dsp_initclass();
00043     
00044     ps_spfft = gensym("__pfft~__"); // owning pfft~ is bound to this while patch is loaded
00045     fftinfo_warning = 1;
00046 
00047     return 0;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void fftinfo_bang(t_fftinfo *x)
00051 {
00052     if (x->x_pfft) {
00053         // just output current values
00054         outlet_int(x->x_out[3], x->x_fullspect); // fullspect flag
00055         outlet_int(x->x_out[2], x->x_ffthop);
00056         outlet_int(x->x_out[1], x->x_n);
00057         outlet_int(x->x_out[0], x->x_fftsize);
00058     }
00059     else if (fftinfo_warning) {
00060         object_post((t_object *)x, "¥ warning: fftinfo~ only functions inside a pfft~",0);
00061         fftinfo_warning = 0;
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void fftinfo_dsp(t_fftinfo *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00066 {
00067     if (x->x_pfft) {
00068         outlet_int(x->x_out[3], (x->x_fullspect = (x->x_pfft->x_fullspect)?1:0));
00069         outlet_int(x->x_out[2], (x->x_ffthop = x->x_pfft->x_ffthop));
00070         outlet_int(x->x_out[1], (x->x_n = sp[0]->s_n));
00071         outlet_int(x->x_out[0], (x->x_fftsize = x->x_pfft->x_fftsize));
00072     }
00073     else if (fftinfo_warning) {
00074         object_post((t_object *)x, "¥ warning: fftinfo~ only functions inside a pfft~",0);
00075         fftinfo_warning = 0;
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void fftinfo_assist(t_fftinfo *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00080 {
00081     if (m == ASSIST_INLET)
00082         sprintf(s,"(signal) Dummy");
00083     else {
00084         switch (a) {    
00085             case 0: sprintf(s,"(int) FFT Frame Size");  break;
00086             case 1: sprintf(s,"(int) Spectral Frame Size"); break;
00087             case 2: sprintf(s,"(int) FFT Hop Size");    break;
00088             case 3: sprintf(s,"(int) Full Spectrum Flag (0/1)");    break;
00089         }
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void fftinfo_free(t_fftinfo *x)
00094 {
00095     dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);
00096 }
00097 
00098 void *fftinfo_new(t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00099 {
00100     t_fftinfo *x;   
00101 
00102     x = newobject(fftinfo_class);
00103     dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x,1);
00104 
00105     x->x_out[3] = intout(x); // fullspect flag
00106     x->x_out[2] = intout(x);
00107     x->x_out[1] = intout(x);
00108     x->x_out[0] = intout(x);
00109     
00110     x->x_fftsize = x->x_ffthop = x->x_fullspect = x->x_n = 0; // init to 0
00111     x->x_obj.z_misc = Z_PUT_FIRST;
00112     x->x_pfft = (t_pfftpub *)ps_spfft->s_thing;
00113     
00114     if (x->x_pfft) {
00115         // these are now correctly initialized in pfft~ when patch is laoded
00116         x->x_fftsize = x->x_pfft->x_fftsize; 
00117         x->x_ffthop = x->x_pfft->x_ffthop;
00118         x->x_fullspect = (x->x_pfft->x_fullspect) ? 1 : 0;
00119         // get temp values for x_n until we turn on dsp and find the real ones
00120         if (x->x_fullspect)
00121             x->x_n = x->x_fftsize; // in "fullspect mode", frame size = fft size
00122         else
00123             x->x_n = x->x_fftsize/2; // in "regular mode", frame size = fft size / 2
00124     }
00125     
00126     return (x);
00127 }
00128 
00129
